scripts.deploy-satsuma:fuji: graph deploy gmx-fuji-referrals ./subgraph-fuji.yaml --version-label $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)-$(date '+%y%m%d%H%M%S')-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --node https://app.satsuma.xyz/api/subgraphs/deploy --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --deploy-key $(cat .satsuma_token)
